授業方法: This course will be conducted face-to-face, promoting real-time interaction and engagement among students. The format will focus on content delivery, practical tasks, and extensive group work aimed at enhancing all four language skills: listening, speaking, reading, and writing. Students will also prepare and deliver presentations, fostering their ability to communicate effectively in an academic environment.
